32#include <sys/cdefs.h>
33#include <sys/param.h>
34#include <sys/mount.h>
35#include <sys/uio.h>
36#include <sys/mntent.h>
37
38#include <stdio.h>
39#include <stdlib.h>
40#include <string.h>
41#include <assert.h>
42
43#undef mount
44
45int
46zmount(const char *spec, const char *dir, int mflag, char *fstype,
47 char *dataptr, int datalen, char *optptr, int optlen)
48{
49 zfs_args_t za;
50
51 memset(&za, 0, sizeof(zfs_args_t));
52
53 strlcpy(za.fspec, spec, sizeof(za.fspec) - 1);
54 if (dataptr != NULL)
55 strlcpy(za.dataptr, dataptr, MAXPATHLEN);
56 strlcpy(za.optptr, optptr, sizeof(za.optptr) - 1);
57 za.mflag = mflag;
58 za.datalen = datalen;
59 za.optlen = optlen;
60
61 /* Null unused variables */
62 za.flags = 0;
63 za.fstype = NULL;
64
65 return mount(fstype, dir, 0, &za, sizeof(za));
66}
67
68int
69umount2(const char *spec, int mflag)
70{
71
72 return unmount(spec, mflag);
73}
74
